article.headline: Pepperdine 57, Houston Baptist 53
article.story: HOUSTON -- Lorne Jackson scored five of his 17 points in overtime, including a crucial 3-pointer, and Pepperdine outlasted Houston Baptist 57-53 on Tuesday night. Pepperdine (2-2) also got 12 points from Jett Raines and 10 rebounds from Stacy Davis. Raines scored Pepperdine's first two basket of the extra period, and Houston Baptist (3-2) couldn't catch up after that. A layup by Art Bernardi with 59 seconds left and a free throw by Marcel Smith with 24 seconds left brought Houston Baptist closer, but a pair of free throws by Jackson with 17 seconds to go iced it for Pepperdine. Bernardi and Tyler Russell each scored 14 points to lead Houston Baptist, and Dauson Womack grabbed 15 rebounds.

statistics.name: assists
statistics.description: The number of times a player who passes the ball to a teammate in a way that leads to a score by field goal, meaning that he or she was "assisting" in the basket. There is some judgment involved in deciding whether a passer should be credited with an assist.

statistics.name: turnovers
statistics.description: The number of times a player loses possession to the other team.

statistics.description: The average number of assists a player or team records per turnover
